1111.content:
After having finished her shopping for the day, Debbie was approached by a man. He wore all black, therefore Debbie could not see his face.

"Hello Debbie." The man greeted. "I have something for you." In his hand the man held an 8 fl oz bottle with a red liquid inside.

"What is it?" Debbie questioned. She felt the urge to take the bottle, but she wanted to know what it was exactly.

"Drink it, and you will find out. I'm sure you will like it." The man answered. "Do not worry. This isn't poisonous or anything like that. It won't harm you." The man placed the bottle in Debbie's hands before quickly waking away before Debbie could ask anymore questions. Debbie looked into the direction the man went, before heading home.

Once home, Debbie placed her shopping items down and sat on her couch. She held the potion in her hands.

"He said it would not harm me." Debbie said. "If I want to know what this is, then I'll have to drink it."

Debbie reached up for the pull string just above the ladder leading into the attic. It wasn’t much of an attic, more of a storage space. Still, she was able to store old boxes of mementos from her family. The weather was changing, the air chilling as winter approached. She’d gone up to find her old hooded sweatshirts, while around the house. As she searched for them, she noticed some old boxes her mother gave her. She opened one and found the photos of her grandparents. There was the first car grandpa bought, and there’s mom learning to ride a bike. The next box held old books and a journal from her grandmother, and underneath it was her mother’s journal. She read the trials and troubles her mother went through, when suddenly there was a crash beside her. She turned her attention to the box that fell next to her.

It was a little dusty, but she remembered getting it from a friend of hers. Debbie remembered her friend asking her to keep it safe, and that she would come back for it eventually. That had been three years ago, and she hadn’t so much as a phone call since. She opened the box and saw what was inside. There were a few empty jars, a book labeled spells, and some odd dolls and trinkets. It all seemed pretty strange, but something at the bottom of the box caught her eye. There was a brown paper bag at the bottom of the box. Debbie grabbed the bag and opened it. Inside were three ordinary objects: a black belt with a silver buckle, a black coffee mug, and a dowel rod with some shapes and symbols carved into it. The objects were simple enough, but she was drawn to them. She didn’t think her friend would mind if she borrowed one of these just for the sake of curiosity. Reaching into the bad, Debbie pulled out the…

11322.content:
Debbie sat the mug on the floor. Placing the bag back into the box, she folded the box closed, and set it back against the stack of other boxes. Turning to leave, she grabs the tote containing her winter clothes and take it along with the mug downstairs. Dropping off the clothing, she takes the mug into the kitchen. She wondered what the contents of the box could have been from. Perhaps they were things from her ex boyfriend. Maybe they were things she found in a garage sale. With winter coming around the corner, Debbie knew she could put the mug to some good use. Hot cocoa and a good book make for a nice evening.

She rinsed off the mugs black, glossy exterior, matching handle, and and then the inside. She filled it up and turned off the water. As she washed the inside, she noticed the water level sinking. Not just from the cleaning, before she finished she watched the water level vanish. She lifted the mug to inspect it for cracks. ‘Of course it would defective,’ she thought, reasoning why the mug was in storage. She couldn’t see any cracks underneath, so she filled the mug again. Just as it did before, the water level sank, until the bottom of the glass was visible and dry. She turned over the mug to inspect it closer, but as she did, water began to pour out of it. She flipped it rightside up, seeing the empty mug still empty, then tipping it over, poured more water until no more water escaped. Debbie began to reevaluate the item in her hand. “Ok, this is a magic mug of infinite space, I guess,” she humored to herself.

Holding the mug under the faucet again, she turns on the water. The cup is filled, then magically empties. She fills it again, and it drains just the same. She fills it a third time, and as it drains, she feels a strange sensation in her chest. She turns her attention to her breasts, which are now sticking out like soft hills from her ribcage. “I must have grown two cup sizes,” she says, not even believing herself. She looks over at the mug and turns it over in the sink. Water begins to pour out, and her chest shrinks, drooping her shirt back to its original position. Debbie finally realizes the potential of this mug, and her deep desires begin to rise to the surface. Now she can have the chest she wants, or even more! She could be even bigger, but just how big could she get? Holding the mug in her hand, Debbie…

11323.content:
Debbie removed the dowel rod from the old box. It was a light colored wood, with several little sigils burned into it. It fit the length of the box, roughly eighteen inches long, but no more around than a bike handlebar. It looked old, maybe ceremonial, but what did Debbie know. She decided to call her friend over to see if she could help. Debbie carried the rod down stairs and put it on her coffee table. She called Amy, a friend from college, studying history and ancient cultures. She might not know exactly what it was, but she could get them started in the right direction.

Amy drove up to the house a few hours later. She had the weekend off, and decided that a visit to her friend to help her out would be a fun afternoon. She knocked on the door, and was greeted by Debbie, and a kind hug. They walked to the living room where Debbie showed Amy the rod in question. “I found it in the attic. I think it belonged to an old acquaintance, but I don’t know what happened to them. What do you think it is?” Amy looked over the rod, reading the sigils and carvings. They appeared old, but she couldn’t figure out where they originated from. “This does appear to be old, maybe five or six hundred years old, and I believe it was used to solve some sort of dispute. There’s stress fractures in the wood, as if people fought over it.” She looked over the rod while grasping it in both hands. Debbie wanted to see for herself, so she reached for the stick. “Really? Let me see.” As she grasped it, a split second of a sensation reached out to both parties.

Amy released the stick, and Debbie held on. A little stunned, Debbie asked, “What was that?” Amy was just as confused. The sensation wasn’t uncomfortable, but it was unexpected. The lifeless wood sent some kind of tingle into each of their bodies, and neither one knew what the result was. Debbie spoke up again, “Amy, what was that?” “I don’t know,” she responds, “I don’t know what that was or how it happened.” Nothing on the rod appeared to be any sort of trigger or button. What could have set it off? “It happened when we both touched the stick. Perhaps if we repeat the process, we can see what will happen.” Debbie posed the idea, but Amy was having second thoughts. Debbie reassured her, “It wasn’t that bad, maybe all it does is send a little feeling into each person, to share some kind of experience, maybe?”

Amy didn’t care for being the test subject, but she didn’t think her friend would intentionally risk her life, or her friends life. She agreed, and as Debbie held out the stick, Amy grabbed hold. The sensation returned, and the stick began to glow a soft yellow. It now felt warm, like it had rested by a campfire. Their breathing began to quicken, and they both looked each other over to see if any changes were occurring. Amy noticed it first, and tried to get her friends attention. When Debbie saw her gaze was at her chest, Debbie looked down.Her chest was pushing outward, filling out almost three inches in front of her. A big smile filled her face as she looked at Amy’s chest. Her friend, almost as small as she was, was sticking out almost four inches in front of her, raising her shirt just a little bit. “Amy, your chest is growing too!” Amy gasped, and released the rod. As soon as she let go, and her hands reached for her breasts, they shrank back to their smaller A cup size. She padded her chest in a sigh of relief, that the changes weren’t permanent, but as she sat back, she saw her friend was still a big as before. Her pumped breasts filling out a very full C cup, putting tension on the fabric of her shirt.

Debbie held the stick in her hands, smiled at Amy and said, “Well, that’s a start.”

113311.content:
Debbie was looking over some items at a garage sale. It was a warm autumn afternoon, folks were cleaning out their houses, and Debbie stopped by her neighbors place to see if there was anything she could use. Some old records were still in good shape, and she found some cool plates to replace the old ones that were chipped and cracked. She carried her things up to Mr. Paulson, her neighbor, sitting at a small card table with a little lock box. “Hey there, Mr. Paulson.” “Hello, Debbie. Good to see you out here. How are things at work?” “Oh, just wishing for that raise to come, but who knows.” “Ah, well, you’re patient, that’s for sure. So, find anything you like?” “Yeah, just these few things. Seems like you guys are getting rid of a lot of cool stuff.” “Yes, well, we’re just making some room before the holidays. Our son is flying home, and we needed to clean out his old room so he has somewhere to stay when he comes home.”

Just as Mr. Paulson finished his sentence, Mrs. Paulson stepped into the garage from the house. Mrs. Paulson seemed like any other nice neighbor, except she had a fantastic chest. They looked like volleyballs stuffed in a teal blouse. She approached Debbie, “Hey there, good to see you again, Debbie. Why haven’t we seen you for dinner more this summer?” “Hey Mrs. Paulson. I’ve been busy with work, just trying to show them how much I offer so they’ll either give me this raise I’ve been asking for, or at least some better hours.” Mrs. Paulson looked at her husband, and he smiled back at her. She turned to Debbie and said, “Why don’t you follow me inside dear. There’s something I want to show you.”

Mrs. Paulson lead Debbie to her bedroom, up to her closet. She reached up on the shelf, and removed a small shoebox. “Debbie, I’ve had this item for quite some time, and it was given to me by a very special person who told me, when the time came, I needed to pass it on to a woman I thought deserving of it. I didn’t think it would change my life like it has, but I think you are the next woman who should have this.” She opened the box and inside was a simple white bra. Debbie had a hard time processing this, “I don’t understand.” “Oh now Debbie, you don’t think I was always this big, did you?” She stuck out her chest, emphasizing their size. As long as Debbie knew her, Mrs. Paulson had always been that big. However, she’d only known her for a few years. “Debbie, this bra is special. If you’re wearing it, you’ll be able to absorb the size off of other women.” She closed the box and handed it to Debbie. “Now, you’ll need to be careful who you take from, you don’t want to harm anyone who wouldn’t deserve it, so take your time and be patient.” Debbie still didn’t understand, but she accepted the gift anyway. “Thanks.”

Debbie walked back to her house with her records, plates, and bra. She locked the door behind her and threw on one of the records she just bought and put the plates in the dishwasher to be cleaned. She sat down on the couch and placed the box in her lap. She opened it up and took the bra from inside. It didn’t special. Simple, no pattern, but it was small enough it would probably fit her. No way it would have fit Mrs. Paulson. If the thing did work, she still didn’t have any clue as to how much, or if there was a way to reverse it. Of course, she could think about it later, tonight was girls night. She was going to catch up with her friends Amy and Candace at the bar. She threw the bra on her couch and went toward her bedroom to change. As she entered, she hung her head out the door, looking at the bra on the couch. Should she wear it tonight? Just in case?
113311.title: Magic Bra

113312.content:
Debbie was downtown one day. She enjoyed looking window shopping on weekends, especially whenever new shops would open. It was pretty regular for a few shops to go out of business once in a while, and then a new one would pop up in the same lot. So she passed the usual clothing stores, the food vendors, and soon came upon one such new store.

‘World Lifestyle’ was printed on the window. A ding sounded above the door as Debbie entered. The small store was dimly lit with many shelves stocked with statues and other odd items. She perused the items but didn’t find any really interesting things she thought she needed. As she passed the counter, a man emerged from the back. He was wearing grey slacks and a matching vest, yellow shirt with stripped neck tie. “Hello my young friend. My name is Vince Hornstrom,” he said with a slight accent. “Is there anything I can help you with?” “Oh, I’m just looking around. I’m really not looking for anything.” “Are you sure I couldn’t interest you in this fine gemstone ring? Very rare and good for your luck.” “That’s alright. I don’t really believe anything could really change my luck, I’ve got enough of it already.”

“Perhaps you do. I have something for you. It is customary in my homeland to give the first customer of your new business a special gift.” Vince twisted a ring on his hand and stared contently at Debbie, “and I think I know exactly what you want.” He reached under the counter and brought out a wooden box. He reached into it and pulled out a red jewel on a golden chain. “This jewel is very special.” He looked around the store to make sure no one else was around. “While you wear it, you will have the ability to take what you want from other women.” Debbie looked at Vince then at the necklace. “Just take it. Trust me, if you don’t want it, feel free to give it to someone else. But be careful who you give it to. The results may be devastating. And I know you won’t, but try not to take too much advantage of people, alright?” Debbie grabbed the necklace from Vince, “Sure, I won’t.”

“Have a lovely day.” Debbie stepped out of the store and looked at the necklace. She put it on and continued down the street.

Debbie was walking through the park in the early morning. To keep in shape, she would walk every day for two miles, or about twice around the park. Although she tried to stay in shape, she didn’t need to do her workout. Her metabolism wouldn’t let her get any larger than she was. Ever since sophomore year, Debbie hasn’t grown an inch. She doesn’t resent her body, but she wished she had more curves. Maybe some slightly bigger boobs and an ass to speak of. Walking along, Debbie didn’t worry about these things. Finishing the first lap, she passed a poor old homeless man. “Excuse me, miss. I don’t really have a place to stay, and it’s been a while since I’ve eaten anything. I was wondering if you could spare some change for an old soul, such as myself?” Debbie jogged in place thinking about the poor old man. She thought about the five dollars in her pocket she kept for her morning latte. Reaching into her backpack, she plucked out the five dollars and handed it to the old man. “Here you go. It’s all I’ve got right now. Sorry.” He grabbed the bill, but Debbie found she couldn’t let go of it, either. “I know, Debbie,” Debbie couldn’t move. She could only hold onto the bill, one foot in the air behind her, looking on to the old man. “…and it’s that selfless action you’ve shown me that will earn you a boon. I’ve looked into your spirit and found what drives you, whether you know it or not.” He held up a bag and Debbie’s hand shot up under it. Place them in water and the corresponding part of you will grow. Your body will adapt to accommodate the extra size and weight. Burn the item and that part of your body will return to its normal size. Be warned, once you burn a stone, it will be gone forever. Do you understand?” Debbie’s head shook up and down, “Good. I’ll be taking that five dollars.” Debbie’s hand released the money, but she still couldn’t move. “Be careful now. Remember, you can grow to your hearts content, but you can only go back once…” The old man walked down the track as a fog rolled in.

As soon as the fog rolled away, Debbie lowered her foot and arm. She looked at the bag in her hand and opened it up. There were four stones of different color. Along with them was a small piece of paper. The paper listed out the different color stone’s associated body part: red was for breasts, blue for her butt, green for height, and yellow for muscles. Debbie clutched the bag in her hand. Could this old man be telling her the truth? How could he make her react that way, freezing her and moving her unwillingly? Not feeling like finishing her walk, and with no money for coffee, Debbie decides to go home.

Throwing her bag on the couch, she sits down in her bedroom. ‘Truth or not, it wouldn’t hurt to try these gems out. She opens the bag…

info.description:
This story is to generate different ideas for breast expansion.

It seems that more and more expansion stories have the same premise. Well I hope this can create some more ideas than the stagnate one's around the web.

Try and post whatever you think can contribute to generating a new idea that someone might want to use. Other forms are allowed, specifically butt and GTS.

Story lengths should last one to two pages. After that, leave a space for people to display their own idea. If you want, make a page for even more ideas, but try to keep them relevant to breast expansion. Multiple forms of the same idea should follow in the same category.
Edit: stories can be longer, I just don't want scores of pages without some kind of expansion. Just leave a spot for someone to add more options if they want. i.e. *3 Something Else

Also, please no hardcore stuff. Soft stuff is fine, and some expansion outside of breast expansion is allowed, as long as the prevailing idea stays in the chest area, and sticks to it's section of the story.
